name: Exchange (itch)
description:
You must sacrifice parts of yourself in order to gain MP, and fight monsters. But be careful. The more you sacrifice, the more abilities you will lose.

Can you climb to the top of the Tower of Gray and become the new Magic King?

Controls:

Move with WASD keys. Select/deselect parts of the body you want to EXCHANGE for MP with the left mouse button. Select one of the four magic spells, and click where on the screen you want to cast them, to attack enemies. Right mouse click will cancel the magic.

1) Stunger -- stuns enemies in the area the spell is cast

2) Fireball -- shoots a fireball in the direction the spell is cast

3) Electropulse -- emits a damaging stun pulse in the area the spell is cast

4) Blackhole -- spawns a black hole that sucks enemies in and inflicts damage, at the point the spell is cast

NOTE:

This game was made for Ludum Dare 43 game jam, and is thus, due to time constraints, unpolished and possibly buggy. There are a lot of features that would've made it better, but I did not have time to implement.
